017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.value.api;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
026
027import java.io.Serial;
028import java.math.BigDecimal;
029import java.util.function.BiPredicate;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
034
035/**
036 *  <p>{@summary An abstract base implementation for the interface
037 *  {@link DimensionedValue}
038 *  that is intended as the base for concrete implementations of value
039 *  types.}</p>
040 *  <p>The {@code validator} argument of the constructors is an instance of
041 *  {@link BiPredicate}
042 *  that takes the
043 *  {@linkplain Dimension unit}
044 *  with that the instance is initialised, and the value, converted to the base
045 *  unit. It returns {@code true} if the given combination is valid, otherwise
046 *  it returns {@code false}.</p>
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: ValueBase.java 1072 2023-09-30 20:44:38Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.0.4
051 *
052 *  @param  <D> The dimension.
053 *  @param  <I> The implementing type.
054 *
055 *  @UMLGraph.link
056 */
057@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ValueBase.java 1072 2023-09-30 20:44:38Z tquadrat $" )
058@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.4" )
059public abstract non-sealed class ValueBase<D extends Dimension, I extends DimensionedValue<D>> implements DimensionedValue<D>
060{
061        /*-----------*\
062    ====** Constants **========================================================
063        \*-----------*/
064    /**
065     *  The default validator.
066     */
067    @SuppressWarnings( "rawtypes" )
068    protected static final BiPredicate DEFAULT_VALIDATOR = ( unit, value) -> true;
069
070        /*------------*\
071    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
072        \*------------*/
073    /**
074     *  The unit for the value.
075     */
076    private D m_Unit;
077
078    /**
079     *  The validation function.
080     */
081    private final BiPredicate<D,BigDecimal> m_Validator;
082
083    /**
084     *  The numerical value for this instance.
085     */
086    private final BigDecimal m_Value;
087
088        /*------------------------*\
089    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
090        \*------------------------*/
091    /**
092     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
093     */
094    @Serial
095    private static final long serialVersionUID = -2075489505691464486L;
096
097        /*--------------*\
098    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
099        \*--------------*/
100    /**
101     *  Creates a new {@code ValueBase} instance.
102     *
103     *  @param  unit   The unit.
104     *  @param  value   The value; only absolute (positive) values are allowed,
105     *      a sign will be stripped.
106     *  @param  validator   The validator function; can be {@code null}.
107     */
108    protected ValueBase( final D unit, final BigDecimal value, final BiPredicate<D,BigDecimal> validator )
109    {
110        requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" );
111        setUnit( unit );
112        final var conversion = unit.toBase();
113        m_Validator = requireNonNullArgument( validator, "validator" );
114        m_Value = validate( conversion.apply( value ) ).abs().stripTrailingZeros();
115    }   //  ValueBase()
116
117    /**
118     *  Creates a new {@code ValueBase} instance.
119     *
120     *  @param  unit   The unit.
121     *  @param  value   The value; it must be possible to parse the given
122     *      String into a
123     *      {@link BigDecimal}.
124     *  @param  validator   The validator function.
125     *  @throws NumberFormatException   The provided value cannot be converted
126     *      into a {@code BigDecimal}.
127     */
128    protected ValueBase( final D unit, final String value, final BiPredicate<D,BigDecimal> validator ) throws NumberFormatException
129    {
130        this( unit, new BigDecimal( requireNotEmptyArgument( value, "value" ) ), validator );
131    }   //  ValueBase()
132
133    /**
134     *  Creates a new {@code ValueBase} instance.
135     *
136     *  @param  <N> The type of {@code value}.
137     *  @param  unit   The unit.
138     *  @param  value   The value.
139     *  @param  validator   The validator function.
140     */
141    protected <N extends Number> ValueBase( final D unit, final N value, final BiPredicate<D,BigDecimal> validator )
142    {
143        this( unit, new BigDecimal( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).toString() ), validator );
144    }   //  ValueBase()
145
146        /*---------*\
147    ====** Methods **==========================================================
148        \*---------*/
149    /**
150     *  {@inheritDoc}
151     */
152    @Override
153    public final BigDecimal baseValue() { return m_Value; }
154
155    /**
156     *  {@inheritDoc}
157     */
158    @Override
159    public I clone()
160    {
161        final I retValue;
162        try
163        {
164            @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
165            final var clone = (I) super.clone();
166            retValue = clone;
167        }
168        catch( final CloneNotSupportedException e )
169        {
170            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e );
171        }
172
173        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
174        return retValue;
175    }   //  clone()
176
177    /**
178     *  {@inheritDoc}
179     */
180    @Override
181    public final I copy()
182    {
183        final var retValue = clone();
184
185        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
186        return retValue;
187    }   //  copy()
188
189    /**
190     *  {@inheritDoc}
191     */
192    @Override
193    public final I copy( final D unit )
194    {
195        final var retValue = copy();
196        retValue.setUnit( unit ); // Does the null check ...
197
198        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
199        return retValue;
200    }   //  copy()
201
202    /**
203     *  {@inheritDoc}
204     */
205    @Override
206    public final boolean equals( final Object obj )
207    {
208        var retValue = this == obj;
209        if( !retValue && (obj instanceof final ValueBase<?,?> other ) )
210        {
211            if( baseUnit() == other.baseUnit() )
212            {
213                retValue = baseValue().compareTo( other.baseValue() ) == 0;
214            }
215        }
216
217        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
218        return retValue;
219    }   //  equals()
220
221    /**
222     *  {@inheritDoc}
223     */
224    @Override
225    public final D getUnit() { return m_Unit; }
226
227    /**
228     *  {@inheritDoc}
229     */
230    @Override
231    public final int hashCode() { return hash( baseValue(), baseUnit() ); }
232
233    /**
234     *  {@inheritDoc}
235     */
236    @Override
237    public final void setUnit( final D dimension ) { m_Unit = requireNonNullArgument( dimension, "dimension" ); }
238
239    /**
240     *  {@inheritDoc}
241     */
242    @SuppressWarnings( "CallToNumericToString" )
243    @Override
244    public final String toString() { return format( ROOT, "%s %s", convert( m_Unit ).toString(), m_Unit.unitSymbol() ); }
245
246    /**
247     *  <p>{@summary Validates the given value, based on the type of the
248     *  dimension.}</p>
249     *  <p>This method will be called by the constructors always with the
250     *  {@linkplain #baseUnit() base unit}
251     *  value just before the value will be initialised.</p>
252     *
253     *  @param  value   The value in base units.
254     *  @return The value.
255     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The validation failed.
256     */
257    private final BigDecimal validate( final BigDecimal value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
258    {
259        if( !m_Validator.test( m_Unit, requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) ) )
260        {
261            //noinspection CallToNumericToString
262            throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Value %s is invalide".formatted( value.toString() ) );
263        }
264
265        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
266        return value;
267    }   //  validate()
268}
269//  class ValueBase
270
271/*
272 *  End of File
273 */
